entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the Minister of Magic, as mentioned in the text. He is speaking to the Prime Minister about the threat posed by Voldemort and his followers.

entities.name: prime minister
entities.description: The Prime Minister is a government official who is being briefed by Fudge on the situation with Voldemort. He seems nervous and unsure about the threat posed by Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort, also known as 'He Who Must Not Be Named', is a dark wizard who has joined forces with his followers and is wreaking havoc. He is mentioned by Fudge as the main threat to the government.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a prison for wizards, where some of Voldemort's followers were being held. They broke out in January and have since joined forces with Voldemort.

relationships.description: Fudge is informing the Prime Minister about the threat posed by Voldemort and his followers. He is briefing him on the situation.
Voldemort's followers broke out of Azkaban prison in January, joining forces with Voldemort and posing a threat to the government.
Voldemort is threatening Fudge and the government by demanding that they stand aside for him. He has also threatened a mass Muggle killing unless his demands are met.
